name: EVERYTHING'S OK (NeoAvantis)
description:
INTRODUCTION

Everything's not ok is a 2D reflex game made in the 49th edition of Ludum Dare. You play as a worker at a nuclear plant who's trying his best to not explode with the reactor by fixing all the problems he encounters. The goal is to try to survive as long as possible and try... not to die I guess ?

CONTROL

Interaction : click on the left mouse button to interact with the many switch in the game.

TEAM

This game was made for our 2nd year at the IIM digital school, we are a group of 7 people.

Game designer : 

Simon DIALINAS - Mathis PHAM

Game programmer :

Thomas RAULIN - Kévin VU-MORELLO - Téo SAUTEREAU

Game Art : 

Marc-Amaury FAURIS - Inès OUHMANI
